Categories.Title: Burnt Yourself
Solutions: Run burned area under cold water
Have someone punch you elsewhere, (it will take your mind off the burning)

Categories.Title: Stain on Clothes
Solutions: IF you need to go into a room with others in it, put a headband on and run quickly through (They will just think you're a streaker
If clothes are white, bleach it carefully.

Get more coffee and strategically spill more on the areas that need it - this way the stained area doesn't look out of place. (If you're feeling creative try for tiedye effect - consider using grape juice for added colour).

Categories.Title: Spilt on Floor
Solutions: Well don't just stand there. Mop that up! (Nothing to wipe it up with? Sacrifice your sock to the cause and use that).

Categories.Title: Tips and Tricks
Solutions: You did ask for a trick didnt you
Okay okay well here's a tip, don't prank you boss unless he has a sense of humor.
